name: SeriesGuide
0:
”Alexa, ask series guide about the next episode of The Flash”
”Alexa, ask series guide to tell me about Game of Thrones”
”Alexa, ask series guide to suggest a TV series”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: series guide
des:
Series Guide will tell you about the air date and time of next episode of your favorite TV Series. 

Also, you can ask about the plots of different TV Shows. 

Don't know which TV Series you should watch next. You can ask Series Guide to suggest you a new TV Series.

How to use:
"Alexa, ask series guide to suggest a drama series"
"Alexa, ask series guide to suggest a TV series"
"Alexa, ask Series Guide to tell me about Game of Thrones"
"Alexa, ask Series Guide about the next episode of The Flash"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
